author: Special Correspondent
text:
A hotel worker drowned at Papanasam Thalaiyanai even as he was taking bath along with his friends on Sunday.

Police said Kazhugachalam (45) of R.S. Colony in Papanasam had gone to Thalaiyanai along with his friends on Sunday. Kazhugachalam, who was taking bath even after his friends left the pool, drowned in it. Without knowing it, his friends reached S.S. Colony in the evening thinking that he might have left a bit early.

When the body was seen floating in the pool on Monday, the matter came to light. The Vickramasingapuram police retrieved the body and sent it to Ambasamudram Government Hospital for a post-mortem.

In another incident, labourer Thirumalai Nambi (56) of Thisaiyanvilai drowned when he was taking bath in an irrigation tank near Manalivilai North Street on Sunday evening.

Thisaiyanvilai police have registered a case.
title: Two drown in separate incidents
